Text:
Thanks very much for those mixes! 
I met a girl yesterday which I never have seen before and after 2 hours she was dancing naked in front of me; your songs work better than a bloody Porsche!
at least a porsche won't piss on your carpet like some of the dogs i know do.
I don't get it.... Do you mean to say that the girl first danced naked and then pissed on his carpet?
